name: HTML
description: Proficient in semantic HTML5 markup, ensuring cross-browser compatibility and accessibility.

name: CSS
description: Expertise in CSS3 for layout design, animations, and responsive web development using frameworks like Bootstrap and Tailwind CSS.

name: JavaScript
description: Strong grasp of JavaScript (ES6+) for dynamic front-end interactions and asynchronous programming, with experience in frameworks like React.js.

name: Python
description: Solid understanding of Python for backend development, data analysis, and scripting, focusing on code readability and efficiency.

name: Django
description: Experienced with Django framework for creating scalable and secure web applications, implementing REST APIs, and managing databases.

name: PostgreSQL
description: Proficient in PostgreSQL for relational database management, data modeling, and executing complex SQL queries for backend operations.
